title: Peeping Tom
stripped_text: "When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type, then reveal all cards in the grip. For the remainder of this run, this ice gains 'Subroutine End the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag.' for each revealed card of the chosen type."

title: Hydra
stripped_text: "Subroutine Do 3 net damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Gain 5 credits if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag."

title: Eavesdrop
stripped_text: "Install Eavesdrop on a piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text 'Whenever the Runner encounters host ice, Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.'"

title: Attitude Adjustment
stripped_text: "Draw 2 cards. Reveal up to 2 agendas in HQ and/or Archives. Gain 2 credits for each agenda revealed, then shuffle those agendas into R&D."

title: Arella Salvatore
stripped_text: "Whenever an agenda is scored from this server, you may install a card from HQ, ignoring all costs, and place 1 advancement token on it."

title: The Outfit: Family Owned and Operated
stripped_text: "Gain 3 credits whenever you take at least 1 bad publicity."

title: Broad Daylight
stripped_text: "When you score Broad Daylight, you may take 1 bad publicity. Place 1 agenda counter on Broad Daylight for each bad publicity you have. click, hosted agenda counter: Do 2 meat damage. Use this ability only once per turn."

title: Drudge Work
stripped_text: "Place 3 power counters on Drudge Work when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Drudge Work, trash it. click, hosted power counter: Reveal an agenda in HQ or Archives. Gain credits equal to its agenda points, then shuffle it into R&D."

title: Blockchain
stripped_text: "Blockchain gains 'Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit and the Runner loses 1 credit.' before all its other subroutines for every 2 faceup transaction operations in Archives. Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit and the Runner loses 1 credit. Subroutine End the run."

title: Formicary
stripped_text: "Whenever the Runner approaches a server, you may rez this ice. If you do, move this ice to the innermost position protecting the approached server. The Runner moves to this ice and encounters it. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner suffers 2 net damage."

title: Building Blocks
stripped_text: "Reveal a barrier from HQ. Install and rez it, ignoring all costs."

title: Too Big to Fail
stripped_text: "Play only if you have fewer than 10 credits. Gain 7 credits and take 1 bad publicity."

title: Under the Bus
stripped_text: "Play only if the Runner accessed a card during their last turn. Trash 1 installed connection resource and take 1 bad publicity."

title: Lady Liberty
stripped_text: "When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Lady Liberty. click, click, click: Add an agenda from HQ to your score area worth agenda points equal to the exact number of hosted power counters. Limit 1 region per server. Limit 1 per deck."
